chara.textHome: Hey! I was waiting for you!
Now, let's do this!
Ready, set...

"Making the most of summer is
what makes you the Mightiest!"
...Hey, you were supposed to yell it, too!
Morning!

I already warmed up by swimming a
kilometer this morning, so I'm feeling great!
Let's make this day the mightiest it can be!

Nothing beats eating yakisoba
at a beach house!

Wait! How about making that yakisoba
Chinese-style, with a thick sauce?
I smell a business opportunity!

The summer sun keeps burning bright,
even when it's setting...
Huh.
Kinda makes me wanna go for a run.
Be right back!

I wanna shoot off some fireworks and
paint the whole night sky in different colors!

I could put an entire load in a cannon
and fire 'em out!
...Wait, I can't?

I fight the summer heat by
turning up the heat myself!

If your heart's ablaze,
you don't need any AC!

At least that's what I used to say
until I passed out one day...
Best not overdo it!

I mean, it sucks when unexpected things
happen to you, but when they do, you
usually get good memories out of it, so...
In other words, I say, "Bring it on!"

Hmm...yeah, I guess you could
look at this place as like...
a kind of haunted house?
So we're going to go test our nerve!
Or not...

Let's warm up before we swim
with some Tsuruno Exercises!
Here's Routine 2!

Point your fingers straight down,
with your arms out in front of you...
and paddle! Paddle 100 times!
Hey, come on! Let's go surf!
We can use this! Right, it's a wok!
Listen, it'll be fine! I think!
I've never tried it before!
N-no...say it isn't so!
It can't be true, right?!
I won't believe it!

You're saying ALL the shaved ice syrups
taste the same?!

We might have to fight out at sea,
so let's visualize it!

The open sea...aboard a ship...
rocked by the waves...casting out a line...
sweet!
Ah, oops, that's not right.

Sunflowers are like THE flower
for summer, right?
I love 'em too!
And their seeds are dee-licious!

I recommend sprinkling a little salt
on them and frying 'em!

Our restaurant changes up the menu
for summer, too.
Our main dish is chilled fried rice!
Huh?
No, we didn't just let it sit out and get cold!

Rather than,
"Now serving chilled egg noodles",

I think I should write it like, "It begins...
Chilled Egg Noodles!", ya know?
Gets you more excited for it!

Wrrrah-oh-wrrrah-oh-wraaah!
Wraaah-ohhh! Hm?

Oh, I was just trying to make it seem like...
I was chatting with the cicadas...

We don't understand each other
yet so I still need more training!

Swim by moving your right arm,
then your left, then right leg,
then left in sequence...
That's the Tsuruno Stroke!
I thought it up, but I can't do it yet either.
Ha ha ha!
